titles.title: To deauthorize a feature of the project for navigation, Fall River Harbor, Massachusetts and Rhode Island.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Water Resources and Environment.

committee.name: House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure

bill.summary: 3/23/1995--Introduced. Deauthorizes the alteration of the Brightman Street Bridge drawspan, previously authorized as a feature of the project for navigation, Fall River Harbor, Massachusetts and Rhode Island, by specified provisions of the River and Harbor Act of 1968.
